welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Murillo, where small town charm meets big city adventure! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valley International Airport serves domestic and international flights.
